title: Want to Replace my Pixel battery.
content:
Hi,

I do have my pixel 1. I am from Ahmedabad, Gujarat, India.

My pixel battery is draining. I think battery need to be replaced with new one. But I am unable to find any authorize google service center. Can anyone help me out??

If there's any authorize service center available in Ahmedabad, Mumbai, Pune or Delhi. So kindly let me know.

Your help will be appreciated.

Thanks.
